name: n8n
description: n8n is a workflow automation platform and alternative to Zapier, enabling self-hosted automations with node-based editing. It offers integrations, triggers, custom code, and an extensible runtime.

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Drag-and-drop interface for building automation workflows without code, connecting nodes to create complex logic flows

features.title: REST API
features.description: Pre-built connectors for popular services including databases, APIs, cloud platforms, and productivity tools

features.title: Custom Code Execution
features.description: Run JavaScript or Python within workflows to handle complex transformations and business logic

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Start workflows via HTTP requests, enabling real-time automation from external systems

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full data ownership with on-premise deployment, ensuring privacy and compliance

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Track workflow changes, rollback to previous versions, and collaborate with team members
